column2: Hold the Congress over Columbia

Now that the war for independence is over, we should try to intergrate the rest of our countries' disenfranchised peoples with a congress where everybody can be heard, and a constitution can be crafted.
Intergrate Rhenish
Now that we've expanded into the Rhine, we should focus on intergrating the local population into the greater Elbian Confederation.
Give Concessions to the Greeks
Greece has long been a unstable and troubling part of Venice, if we were to give them some concessions and political representation it would go a long way to fully intergrate them.
Intergrate the Lotharians
In our quest for the unification of Ameriga, we have fully incorporated the former lands of Lotharingia. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Amerigan Dream.
Northern Ambitions

Now that we've reclaimed Atlanta and secured our positon as an amerigan power, high spheres of influence are now pushing for further expansion into Amazonie, some are even proposing a federation between them!
Intergrate the Amazonians
In our quest for the unification of Ameriga, we have fully incorporated the former lands of Amazonie. We can now try to persuade the local population to embrace the Amerigan Dream.
Pan-Boer Dream
The Pan-Boer Dream is attracting immigrants from all over the world!
Integration of the Venetians
With control over Venice proper, we are now able to integrate and unite with our Venetian brothers in our quest for a united Italy!
The Literacy of the Pomeranians
Through integration the literacy of the Pomeranians has increased, but they are not fully integrated yet.
You can never be too educated.
The Literacy of the Rheinish
Through integration the literacy of the Rheinish has increased, but they are not fully integrated yet.
You can never be too educated.
Re-Establish Islam in the Middle East
Since the Janissaries took power we can propose a policy of Re-establishing the Islamic institution in the Middle East, and hopefully gain the support of the local Arabs!
Declare Ourselves the Leaders of Islam
Now with complete control over Mecca and Medina, the heartland of Islam, aswell as the surrounding territories with little opposition we can finally declare ourselves the leaders of Islam!
English Nationalism Reignited
English nationalism have reignited in our recently conquered territories in the isles!
They better not cause trouble.
English Nationalism Supressed
English nationalism have been supressed in our recently reconquered territories in the isles!
It better stay that way.
French Nationalism Reignited
French nationalism have reignited in our recently conquered territories in France!
French Nationalism Supressed
French nationalism have been supressed in our recently reconquered territories in France!
Gold Mine Sabotaged!
The Chinese have sabotaged their own gold mine before we took control, rendering it unusable!
Bastards!
Gold Mine Discovered!
A new gold mine has been discovered in $PROVINCENAME$!
Lets get to work!!
Interwar Warfare
The age of interwar warfare has begun, allowing more frontage.
Interwar Warfare 1925
The age of interwar warfare has continued, allowing more frontage.
Recently Fired Bureaucrats
We have recently fired unaccepted bureaucrats to save on our administrative spending.
Fire All Minority Bureaucrats
Fire all minority bureaucrats and demote them to farmers and labourers, however this may affect our administrative effiency short-term.
Kick All Players not Allied to You
Does what it says.
Ally All Player Countries in the Game
Does what it says.
Ends All Wars Against You
Does what it says.
Dominate France

The Plantagenet Kingdom of France has long been a thorn in the side of our prosperous state. With our total domination of French lands, we must secure our claim so that none can rule France but Burgundy. This decision is exclusive with Occitania decision.
Revive the Kingdom of Arles

With our recent conquests in Occitania, we now have control over the ancient lands of the Burgundians, under the fallen Kingdom of Arles. By reclaiming the title of the King of Arles, we can lay claim to the lands of Occitania. This decision is exclusive with France decision.
The French Dream
With our successful reign of France, the echoes of revolt have faded and the French truly accept our rule. There is no longer threat of a French revolt, for we are ourselves France.
The English Dream
With our successful reign of England, the echoes of revolt have faded and the English truly accept our rule. There is no longer threat of a English revolt, for we are ourselves England.
Expand the Latin Empire

With the strength of our newly founded Latin Empire, it is time we look towards the cowardly Castillian nation and evict them from their powerbase in Iberia. None shall hold dominion over the descendants of the Latins but us.
Dominate Iberia

The Castillian state has been crushed, leaving none to question Aragonese dominion over Iberia. Although the Portuguese fiercely resist joining our empire, the Castillians are willing to accept our conquests. A truly glorious day for Aragon. §R Taking this decision will BLOCK the formation of Aragon-Italy
Secure Foothold in Iberia

Wih our humiliating defeat in Southern Italy, we have finally brought back honor to Aragon by crushing the perfidious Castillians and securing our foothold in Iberia. With the Portuguese willing to accept our rule, it seems Aragon will be the master of Iberia.
Fate of the Dual Monarchy
The time has come to decide what fate our nation should take, and speak on the Anglois dilemma. §R This decision will be forced onto you after 1840.
Grant Romanians Rights

With the the equalizing reforms our nation has recently undertaken, a large amount of Romanians within our borders and beyond have begun to see Hungary as a secure place for Romanians reeling under foreign domination. By granting these citizens more rights, they will likely see themselves as citizens of Hungary, not Romania or any other foreign power.
